item.title: Filter And Quick Edit Products
item.description: Filter And Quick Edit Products Steps Step Description Expected result go to Catalog>products page Title page contains ‘Products •’ Reset all filters and get number of products Total of products > 0 Filter product by product id Criteria : Min ‘1’ Max: ‘3’ Number of products < Total of products All products id are between 1 and 3 Reset filters Number of products = Total of products Filter product by product name

item.title: Sort and pagination Products
item.description: Sort and pagination Products Steps Step Description Expected result Go to products page Page title contains ‘Products’ Sort by id_product desc table is sorted by id_product desc (3 -> 2 -> 1) Sort by name asc table is sorted by name asc (a -> b -> c) Sort by name desc table is sorted by name desc (c -> b -> a) Sort by reference asc table is sorted by reference asc (a -> b -> c) Sort by reference desc table is sorted by reference desc (c -> b -> a) Sort by name_category asc table is sorted by name_category asc (a -> b -> c) Sort by name_category desc table is sorted by name_category asc (c -> b -> a) Sort by price (Tax exclud) asc table is sorted by price (Tax exclud) asc (1 -> 2 -> 3) Sort by price (Tax exclud) desc table is sorted by price (Tax exclud) desc (3 -> 2 -> 1) Sort by sav_quantity asc table is sorted by sav_quantity desc (1 -> 2 -> 3) Sort by sav_quantity asc table is sorted by sav_quantity desc (3 -> 2 -> 1) Sort by id_product asc table is sorted by id_product desc (1 -> 2 -> 3) Create 3 products from BO 3 Products are created Change Display items to 20 There are two pages Click on Next The Second page is displayed Click on Previous The first page is displayed Change Display items to 50 Pagination = 1 Delete the Created products Products are well deleted

item.title: Add Standard Product
item.description: Add Standard Product Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products > Click “New product” Page New product will open Fill in product Name, Reference, Quantity > Click Save Message Settings updated. appears Click “Preview” New page will open with newly create product Disable product by unchecking Offline option > Save > Click Preview Message Settings updated.

item.title: Add Pack Product
item.description: Add Pack Product Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products > Click Add new products > Choose pack of products > Enter a name > Add quantity > Add price Message Settings updated. appears Add a simple product to the pack > Add a virtual product + increase quantity > Add customizable product > Save Message Settings updated.

item.title: Add Virtual Product
item.description: Add Virtual Product Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products > Click Add new product > Choose Virtual Product > Enter name + price + quantity > Click Save Message Settings updated. appears Click Offline to uncheck it Product is now Online In tab Virtual > Add an associated file (png, jpg or other) > Choose file > Add filename > Add Number of allowed downloads > Add Expiration Date > Add number of days > Save Message Settings updated.

item.title: Edit Product
item.description: Edit Product Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products > Click on the Pen of an existing product Edit product page opens in tab Basic Settings In Basic Settings Edit name of product - reference - price - images - description > Click Save Info updated Message Settings updated. appears Add Feature > Pre-defined value > Save Message Settings updated.

item.title: Preview Product
item.description: Preview Product Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products page The Product list page is displayed Reset all filters Number of products = total products Filter products by Name Number of products < Total products All products name contains the Searched Name Click on the drop-down toggle and click on Preview The FO > Products details page is displayed and the product name = searched name Click on product of your choice > Click on button Preview Product page will open in another tab

item.title: Duplicate Product
item.description: Duplicate Product Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products page The Product list page is displayed Reset all Filters Number of products = Total of products Filter by Product Name Number of products < Total of products All products contains the searched Name Click on the drop-down toggle and click on Duplicate An alert “Product successfully duplicated.

item.title: Delete product from list
item.description: Delete product from list Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products page The Products page is displayed Reset all filters Number of products = Total of products Filter Products by Name Number of products < Total of products All the products contains the searched Name Click on the drop-down toggle, click on “Delete” and confirm the deletion An alert “Product successfully deleted.
